description.p: You are a member of one of the many adventurers guilds across Orizon. Whether you are a recent member or a veteren of a guild you have learnt how to navigate its intracices well, finding the best quests, and knowing where to look for information.
Discuss with your dm what guild you are a member of, and what plate you have, depending on your starting level.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Persuasion and one Strenth or Dexterity based skill.
Proficiencies: One gaming set or musical instrument of your choice and vehicles proficieny(land).

Equipment: A plate indicating your rank in the guild, a set of travelers clothes, a map of the local area, a gaming set or musical instrument, some trinket of signifigance to your journey (A photo of your dead parents?) and a belt pouch containing 15 gp.

description.p: Adventurers are an extremly varied group of people, ranging from the truly altruistic to the deeply evil, the traits following are suggestions, but we encourage you to come up with your own!

setters.set: Persuasion, Atheletics or Acrobatics, vehicle proficieny(land) and one instrument or gaming set.

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: The guilds rules are there for a reason, I will be expecting us to follow them all.
The best way to get me to do something is to tell me I can't do it.
I tell stories about my adventures to anyone who will listen. Even tales of woe and disaster are told with enthusiasm.
I believe only fellow adventurers have seen what the world has to offer. Im always telling the commonfolk they don't know what they're missing.
I've had to be reassigned to different parties in the past due to my prickly personality.
Thinking things through is a waste of time, let's just get to the fight.
I'm never more at home then when I'm on a journey.
If it's remotely possible that theres a non-violent solution, I'll try to find it.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Order. The world is chaotic and broken, adventurers are some of the few who can bring some sense of order to it. (Lawful)
Heroism. I wish to be a hero, one who helps the helpless. (Good)
Freedom. I go where I wish, and do as I please, being an adventurer lets me live this lifestyle. (Chaotic)
Fame and Fortune. People adventurer for two reasons: people, or the paycheck, I'm the latter. (Evil)
Interest. If the job is interesting, I'm willing. (Neutral)
Adrenaline. I love the thrill of danger and the unknown. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I have a rival at the guild, someone Im keen to one up.
I am member today, but one day, I will run this guild.
I've always been an adventurer, the guild is my family.
There is a hero in the guild that I seek to emulate.
I will always remember my first adventuring party.
A decision I made caused the death of another, I mean to make up for this.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I don't stop to think about the collateral damage.
I don't question the motives of my employer.
I am convinced of the signifigance of my own destiny. I am the main character of this story.
The guild doesn't know, but I forged my entry documents.
I spend of my share on worldly vices.
I egregiously underestimate the risks a job represents.

description.p: You are well accustomed to navigating the internal politics of the guild and you know how to get a good reputation among guild employees. Employees may come to you with jobs yet to be posted to the board that they think you'd be a good fit for, and you could easily find these yourself, should the need arise.

The guilds of Orizon have access to large amounts of information, getting this information from the guild is not always easy. You however, have mastered this art. From parties in need of a member, to things other adventurers have discovered on their travels, you've learned well how to get this information from the guild.

element.name: Optional Feature: Guild Sweetheart
element.supports: Background Feature, Optional Background Feature Orizon

description.p: Many guilds throughout Orizon have members of particular importance, beloved by both the local community and the guild... and used on all the guilds promotional materials. The Guild has a vested interest in you and will provide room, board, and when possible assistance on your quests, and will go to great lengths to try and ensure your success.

However, all this depends on you remaining in the guilds good graces. Bringing disrepute or even not doing the things they ask of you; will see you swifly lose this status. Discuss with your party before taking this optional feature.
